summary:
Always wanted to look like Poison Ivy?
Now you can!
And all this in a more lorefriendly way.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Georgia][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77225-0-1469022414.png[/img]
[size=2][color=#93c47d]After I made the Harley Quinn preset, I wanted to expand on the idea.
So I made a Poison Ivy RaceMenu Preset this time.
It takes more mods to work (see requirements)

The idea of a RaceMenu Preset is very simple:
You can use this preset to make your character look like Poison Ivy.[/color]

[/size][b][color=#00ff00][size=5]Permission[/size][/color]
[/b][color=#93c47d]I like the idea of a follower mod. Just like with Harley Quinn, I can not do that myself.[/color]
[color=#93c47d]If one of you would like to make a follower mod, just contact me by sending a personal message.[/color]
[color=#93c47d]Keep in mind that most of the features within this preset are from other modders.[/color]
[color=#93c47d] So by making a follower mod, you will need the permission of the authors too.[/color]
[color=#93c47d](This for both the Required mods as the Recommended)[/color]

[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]Two Versions[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#93c47d][size=2]Someone noticed that the preset does not work with elves.
It is a good idea to have this preset for the elven character. She is a magic user after all.
[/size]So I made a second version that you can use if you want to play as an elf character.
Ofcourse, this preset will not work on beastraces. Surprisingly it does work for orcs.

Main file is for the human races.
Optional file is for the elven races.
You don't don't need the main file if you want to use the elf version.[/color]

[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]Requirements:[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#93c47d]RaceMenu[/color]
[color=#93c47d]KS Hairdos[/color]
[color=#93c47d]Fair skin complexion (with all the make-up features)[/color]
[color=#93c47d]Stroja's Warpaints[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/60769/?[/url]
[color=#93c47d]Ravens Warpaint[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641/?]http://www.nexusmods...im/mods/45641/?
[/url][/font][font=Georgia][color=#93c47d]The Coenaculi (Body Tattoo's)[/color]
[color=#93c47d]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35677/?[/color]
[b]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77225-6-1469020284.png[/img]
[size=5]
[color=#00ff00]Recommended Mods:[/color][/size][/b]
[color=#93c47d]XP32 Skeleton Extended[/color]
[color=#93c47d]UNP or CBBE bodytype. [/color]
[color=#93c47d]Bodyslide[/color]

[color=#93c47d]For a more acurate gameplay for Poison Ivy, I reccomend the following mods:[/color]
[color=#93c47d]Summon Spriggans and Spriggan Matrons: [/color]
[color=#93c47d]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32228/?[/color]
[color=#93c47d]Spriggan Swarm:[/color]
[color=#93c47d]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57751/?[/color]
[color=#93c47d]Nature Spells:[/color]
[color=#93c47d]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24724/?[/color]

[color=#93c47d]When it comes to armor, that could be a hard one.[/color]
[color=#93c47d]There are not much armors that looks like what Ivy would wear.[/color]

[color=#93c47d]But you could try this one:[/color]
[color=#93c47d]Hermaeus More Priestess:[/color]
[color=#93c47d]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58062/?[/color]


[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]I hope you will enjoy the mod![/size][/color]
[/b][color=#93c47d]Let me know what you think about this. [/color]
[color=#93c47d]I accept requests for any other female characters from comics or games. Just let me know![/color]


[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]Check out my other mods!
[/size][/color][/b]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77093-7-1468523562.png[/img]

[/font][font=Georgia][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77093/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D77093%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Harley Quin[/url][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77093/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D77093%26preview%3D&pUp=1]n - Standalone Follower[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77040/?][font=Georgia]Harley Quinn - RaceMenu Preset

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77254/?]Catwoman - RaceMenu Preset[/url][/font][/center]
author: Yourskyrim123
